site.title: EFFI - AI-powered 24/7 answering service in Tallinn, Estonia
site.description: Improve customer service and increase revenue with our AI phone system in Tallinn and across Estonia. Perfect for restaurants, dental clinics, car sales, and furniture stores.

hero.platformTitle: Everything you need in one platform

services.sectionSubtitle: Our AI solution is tailored to Estonian business sectors, offering specific functionality and integration capabilities for companies in Tallinn and other Estonian cities.

restaurants.title: Restaurants in Estonia
restaurants.description: Optimize bookings and orders in Tallinn restaurants, reduce staff burden and increase customer satisfaction in Estonia's gastronomy sector.

automotive.title: Car Sales in Estonia
automotive.description: Capture test drive inquiries across Estonia, answer pricing questions and direct qualified buyers to sales teams in Tallinn and other cities.

dental.title: Dental Clinics in Estonia
dental.description: Handle emergency calls in Tallinn dental clinics, schedule appointments and answer Estonian insurance questions.

furniture.title: Furniture Stores in Estonia
furniture.description: Share product information in Estonian furniture stores, check inventory and schedule consultations across Estonia.

features.sectionTitle: Why choose our AI solution in Estonia?
features.sectionSubtitle: Our technology ensures that no call goes unanswered in Tallinn or elsewhere in Estonia, bringing your company's availability and efficiency to a new level in the local market.

missedCalls.title: Missed calls cost you revenue
missedCalls.description: The average Estonian restaurant loses a significant portion of inquiries unanswered, which equals lost revenue. Our AI solves this problem.

availability.title: 24/7 availability across Estonia
availability.description: A large portion of booking and appointment inquiries happen outside business hours. Our AI answers calls around the clock across Estonia.

results.title: Proven Results
results.description: Our clients in Tallinn and other Estonian cities experience significant results within the first few months.

integration.title: Seamless Integration
integration.description: We integrate with your existing Estonian business systems, ensuring smooth workflow and real-time updates.

performance.title: Top-tier Performance
performance.description: 99% response accuracy and instant reaction ensure your customers always receive the best service.

process.sectionSubtitle: Our thoughtful four-step process ensures successful implementation and long-term success of your AI solution

discovery.title: Discovery
discovery.description: We start by understanding your business needs, challenges, and goals through thorough consultation

strategy.title: Strategy
strategy.description: Our team develops a customized AI implementation plan aligned with your specific goals and requirements

implementation.title: Implementation
implementation.description: We bring the solution to life with precision, ensuring quality through continuous testing and improvement

support.title: Support

testimonial.quote: Our structured approach ensures that every AI project is carried out professionally and achieves the expected results. From the first consultation to long-term support.
